issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In iOS since I have installed the new version of appcelerator studio my apps crash when start this is the error:
{color:red}Unable to get short BSD proc info for 614: No such process{color}

*Testing Environment:*
*Operating System*
Name = Mac OS X
Version = 10.10.5
Architecture = 64bit
*CPUs = 8*
Memory = 4294967296
Node.js
Node.js Version = 0.10.32
npm Version = 1.4.28
Titanium CLI
CLI Version = 5.0.4
Titanium SDK
SDK Version = 4.0.0.GA
SDK Path = /Users/acavero/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/4.0.0.GA
Target Platform = iphone

Related Community: https://community.appcelerator.com/topic/3535/urgent-app-crashes-when-start-appcelerator-update-error/2
fields.summary: App crashes when start, appcelerator update error

comments.body: We need more information on this. Is there a stack trace or crash report? And have we tried using the latest version of everything?
